thread.title: Good General Manager and Good Accounting and Sales Manager with Well trained personnel
thread.title_full: Good General Manager and Good Accounting and Sales Manager with Well trained personnel - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: camillebroulaw
title: Good General Manager and Good Accounting and Sales Manager with Well trained personnel
text:
The General Manager Ms Park and the Accounting Manager are very good guest care providers including the front desk associates.
The personnel is nice/polite, humble.
The hotel is clean.
The food is good.
The only issue is the parking manager and staff who overcharge illegally.
The parking staff and management staff charge the same SUVs size different prices for the same size to different drivers/owners. There is an anarchy for parking occupation in terms of price charge or fee to different persons for the same size of cars based on people coming from various areas of the USA for Business, Pleasure/Tourisms, Familily Gathering and so on. That is wrong. This matter shall be reviewed and or corrected.
Overall, this hotel shall be recommended to Honorable persons, to United Nations Diplomats/Country Ambassadors-Country Government Officials/Presidents for a safe, secure and protected environment and for clean rooms, comfortables beds, good breakfasts, nice front dest associates and Managers considerations.
Again, this Hotel met the major criterias in terms of Rules of Law on Hospitality and related Guest care Performances except the parking personnelwho abusivement charging fees any time they want to, based onsome individuals/drivers-automotive owners origins.
Camille Brou, Supervisory Investigator MultiDisciplinary and MultiJurisdictional Lawyers Research Development Program UAIP
8082716858
